H0.text: The Black Hills are located primarily in which US state. South Dakota

H1.text: The Black Hills are located primarily in which US state. North Dakota

H2.text: The Black Hills are located primarily in which US state. Montana

H3.text: The Black Hills are located primarily in which US state. SoDak

A4.text: The Black Hills is an isolated mountain range rising from the Great Plains of North America in western South Dakota and extending into Wyoming, United States.

A5.text: The name of the range in Lakota is Pahá Sápa. It encompasses the Black Hills National Forest.
